conclusion: Analyze arrangement of objects and shadows with light source above them.
Objects labeled A, B, C, and D cast shadows on the ground.
Light source is positioned above the objects.
Shadows will change in size and position when light source moves forward.
Objects identified as typewriter, butterfly, mushroom, and peach.
Light source is above the objects, casting shadows.
Shadow of typewriter moves right, butterfly moves left when light source moves.
Shadows shift based on relative positions to light source; closer objects have larger shadows.
Shadows move in relation to light source; closer objects have larger shadows.
Shadows move to the right when light source moves forward above the objects.
